actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide an additional payment under part A of the medicare program for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services of hospitals with a high proportion of patients who are medicare beneficiaries.
short_title: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1993

summary.text: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1993 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide, for FY 1994 and 1995, an additional Medicare payment to a hospital when at least 65 percent of its inpatient days or discharges are attributable to Medicare beneficiaries.

titles.title: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1993

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide an additional payment under part A of the medicare program for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services of hospitals with a high proportion of patients who are medicare beneficiaries.
